lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s/Case-Shiller 20-city home price index rose 4.9 percent in April from 12 months earlier, about the same annual pace as March.

headline.main: Home Prices Rose in April, and Consumer Confidence Is Climbing
headline.print_headline: Home Prices Rose in April, and Consumer Confidence Is Climbing

snippet: The Standard & Poor’s/Case-Shiller 20-city home price index rose 4.9 percent in April from 12 months earlier, about the same annual pace as March.
